languages.text: The next attack against this creature will be absorbed by its cursed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The attacking enemy will also be cursed, suffering a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from the next incoming attack.

traits.locale_text: The next attack against this creature will be absorbed by its cursed armour. The attacking enemy will also be cursed, suffering a critical hit from the next incoming attack.

The next attack against this creature will be absorbed by its cursed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The attacking enemy will also be cursed, suffering a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from the next incoming attack.

The next attack against this creature will be absorbed by its cursed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The attacking enemy will also be cursed, suffering a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from the next incoming attack.

languages.text: 对此生物的下次攻击会被诅咒{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}吸收。此外，攻击者会受到诅咒，下次受到攻击时必定会承受暴击。{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}
languages.original_text: The next attack against this creature will be absorbed by its cursed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The attacking enemy will also be cursed, suffering a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from the next incoming attack.

traits.locale_text: 对此生物的下次攻击会被诅咒护甲吸收。此外，攻击者会受到诅咒，下次受到攻击时必定会承受暴击。

languages.text: Урон от следующей атаки против этого существа будет поглощен его проклятой {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броней{/g}. Атакующий также получит проклятие: следующее {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g}, которое он получит, станет критическим.
languages.original_text: The next attack against this creature will be absorbed by its cursed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The attacking enemy will also be cursed, suffering a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from the next incoming attack.

traits.locale_text: Урон от следующей атаки против этого существа будет поглощен его проклятой броней. Атакующий также получит проклятие: следующее попадание, которое он получит, станет критическим.
Урон от следующей атаки против этого существа будет поглощен его проклятой броней. Атакующий также получит проклятие: следующее попадание, которое он получит, станет критическим.

languages.text: この生物に与えられる次の攻撃は、その呪われた{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}によって吸収される。攻撃する敵も呪われ、次に来る攻撃でクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: The next attack against this creature will be absorbed by its cursed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The attacking enemy will also be cursed, suffering a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from the next incoming attack.

traits.locale_text: この生物が受ける次の攻撃は、その呪われたアーマーによって吸収される。攻撃する敵も呪われ、次に来る攻撃でクリティカルヒットを受ける。

languages.text: El siguiente ataque contra esta criatura será absorbido por su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} maldita. El enemigo atacante además quedará maldito, recibiendo un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} crítico del siguiente ataque del que sea objetivo.
languages.original_text: The next attack against this creature will be absorbed by its cursed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The attacking enemy will also be cursed, suffering a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from the next incoming attack.

traits.locale_text: El siguiente ataque contra esta criatura será absorbido por su armadura maldita. El enemigo atacante además quedará maldito, recibiendo un impacto crítico del siguiente ataque del que sea objetivo.

languages.text: Der nächste Angriff gegen diese Kreatur wird von ihrer verfluchten {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} absorbiert. Der angreifende Feind wird ebenfalls verflucht und erleidet durch den nächsten Angriff eines Feindes einen kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g}.
languages.original_text: The next attack against this creature will be absorbed by its cursed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The attacking enemy will also be cursed, suffering a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from the next incoming attack.

traits.locale_text: Der nächste Angriff gegen diese Kreatur wird von ihrer verfluchten Rüstung absorbiert. Der angreifende Feind wird ebenfalls verflucht und erleidet beim nächsten eingehenden Angriff einen kritischen Treffer.

languages.text: L'attaque suivante portée contre cette créature est absorbée par son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} maudite. L'attaquant est également maudit et subit un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} critique lors de l'attaque suivante.
languages.original_text: The next attack against this creature will be absorbed by its cursed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The attacking enemy will also be cursed, suffering a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from the next incoming attack.

traits.locale_text: L'attaque suivante portée contre cette créature est absorbée par son Armure Maudite. L'attaquant est également maudit et subit un coup critique lors de l'attaque suivante.

languages.text: Bu yaratığa karşı bir sonraki saldırı, yaratığın lanetli {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhı{/g} tarafından emilir. Ayrıca, saldıran düşman da lanetlenerek bir sonraki gelen saldırıda kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşa{/g} maruz kalır.
languages.original_text: The next attack against this creature will be absorbed by its cursed {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The attacking enemy will also be cursed, suffering a critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} from the next incoming attack.
